Description: The top level WRC+ class which now is anticipating NGRC1, equipped with H4DPA 1.6L i4 engine, 2.5 bar anti-lag turbo with 36mm restrictor, active center differential with hydrualic shaft disengage mechanism and 6-speed sequential transmission. After development the 2021 generation has multiple VO parts for different situations. Gravel spec has over 300mm of suspension travel and 300mm brake discs. This setup should be a good starting point.
